channel.title: Logging on
channel.description:
ever since i jarred my client ive had problems logging onto my server.
before you say, have you portforwarded, checked ports etc. well, yes i have. i sent out the client to a few friends with the class files so they could test, and we could all log on perfectly, no i jarred my client, it says "server is offline, please retry every 2 hours" but yet sometimes i can log in and sometimes i get that message, never had this problem before.

item.title: Logging on
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

it happens with my run.bat and my client.jar
but yet other people can log on straight away…

Read full topic
